definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to set up a stall/to maintain a large staff and organization

sentences.english: E. g. I don't know how to straighten the mess out.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道该如何收拾这个烂摊子。

sentences.english: Later, the hotel closed, Xiaoding recommendations to make snack stalls.
sentences.chinese: 晚了，饭店也关门了，小丁建议去小摊子上弄小吃。

sentences.english: a financial train wreck between the deficit social security and medical care.
sentences.chinese: 就是社保和医保赤字的烂摊子。

sentences.english: How do we get out of this mess?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何走出这片烂摊子？

sentences.english: I'll leave this to you. Cauze I don't want to miss the party.
sentences.chinese: 我把这个烂摊子给你了，因为我不想错过舞会。

sentences.english: Rich people never buy cheap goods from vendors at the roadside.
sentences.chinese: 有钱人从来不买路边摊子上的贱物。

sentences.english: The kitchen was an awful mess.
3 years later, this factory closed down, I began to set up temporary stalls.
sentences.chinese: 3年后，这家工厂倒闭了，于是我开始摆小摊子过活。

sentences.english: Flag sales are a street corner cottage industry.
sentences.chinese: 街角也有出售国旗的摊子。

sentences.english: It's stayed the same for other things like biscuits," Olga, a bread-seller at a Moscow kiosk, said today.
sentences.chinese: 莫斯科小摊子上的面包商Olga今天这么表示。

sentences.english: There is a long line at the hotdog stand.
sentences.chinese: 卖热狗的摊子前排着长队。

sentences.english: I stood by the stall of a seller of dates and waited.
sentences.chinese: 我立在一个卖红枣的摊子边等候。

sentences.english: Stallholders stand behind tiny tightly cluttered stalls.
sentences.chinese: 摊贩站在小小的拥挤不堪的摊子后面。

sentences.english: Who is to blame for this mess?
sentences.chinese: 谁是这个烂摊子的始作俑者？

sentences.english: We have inherited a very confused situation, which we are now trying to straighten out.
sentences.chinese: 我们接过来一个乱摊子，现在我们正在设法清理。

sentences.english: Excuse me, could you tell me where the popcorn stand is?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，能否告诉我卖爆玉米花的摊子在哪里吗？

definition: to set up a stall/to maintain a large staff and organization
to set up a vendor's stall in the street
street stall with goods laid out on the ground
